Name: Interlude
About the game: Interlude is a network of games and virtual worlds. All these games implement the Scavenger Hunt Protocol: a meta-game that allows developers to hide keys in their games, and that rewards the successful key hunters with prizes in cryptocurrency.
Meta Title: Interlude: Aug 10, 2020, Interlude Project and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Interlude? Check out the release date (Aug 10, 2020), developer insights from Interlude Project, and a complete game summary.
